Expand description

The common trait implemented for data queries

Both interfaces return DataResults, which are self-contained description of the data to be added to a SpaceView including both the EntityPath and context for any overrides.

Required Methods§

source

fn execute_query( &self, property_resolver: &impl PropertyResolver, ctx: &StoreContext<'_>, entities_per_system_per_class: &HashMap<SpaceViewClassName, HashMap<ViewSystemName, HashSet<EntityPath, BuildHasherDefault<NoHashHasher<EntityPath>>>, BuildHasherDefault<NoHashHasher<ViewSystemName>>>, BuildHasherDefault<NoHashHasher<SpaceViewClassName>>> ) -> DataResultTree

Execute a full query, returning a DataResultTree containing all results.

auto_properties is a map containing any heuristic-derived auto properties for the given SpaceView.

This is used when building up the contents for a SpaceView.

source

fn resolve( &self, property_resolver: &impl PropertyResolver, ctx: &StoreContext<'_>, entities_per_system_per_class: &HashMap<SpaceViewClassName, HashMap<ViewSystemName, HashSet<EntityPath, BuildHasherDefault<NoHashHasher<EntityPath>>>, BuildHasherDefault<NoHashHasher<ViewSystemName>>>, BuildHasherDefault<NoHashHasher<SpaceViewClassName>>>, entity_path: &EntityPath, as_group: bool ) -> DataResult

Find a single DataResult within the context of the query.

auto_properties is a map containing any heuristic-derived auto properties for the given SpaceView.

This is used when finding the result for a single entity such as in a selection panel.
